name: Hitch Bird
description:
In Hitch Bird, you play as bee-eater bird, hitching a ride on an elephant. The elephant flushes out your prey, but you’re not the only hungry bee-eater around. 🐘🐦🐝

Gameplay
  • Fly into other birds to scare them away.
  • Fly into insects to eat them.
  • Make sure you don’t run out of stamina in midair! (tip: elephant backs are great for replenishing rests)
  • Activate DEMON mode by pressing Y once you’ve eaten 10 Bees, you can now EAT the other birds!
Controls
  • Flap wings: Spacebar / Xbox A
  • Fly around: WASD / Xbox Right Stick
  • Camera Control: Mouse / Xbox Left Stick
  • Dash: Left Mouse Button / Xbox X
  • Tweet: Right Mouse Button / Xbox B
  • Demon: Y / Xbox Y
